items.sentence: It would be unwise to postpone making a decision.
There are three men waiting for you on the porch.
Everyone's been trying to convince me to do that.
Tom was the one who told Mary what she should do.
Tom's face swelled up after being stung by a bee.
Tom didn't know when he was supposed to be there.
Tom seemed to know that Mary had moved to Boston.
You're throwing away the best years of your life.
The men left and soon vanished into the darkness.
Tom knows he has to do what Mary tells him to do.
